title: What the SpaceX acquisition of xAI means for industrial robotics
description:
The consolidation of SpaceX and xAI could lead to more adaptive use of robots, data, and AI in manufacturing, says Flexxbotics' CEO.

The post What the SpaceX acquisition of xAI means for industrial robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
